header.title: Tracdelight API
header.content:
Overview

Welcome to the official API documentation for the Tracdelight API. The Tracdelight API empowers developers to interact, extend and combine Tracdelight's services with other third-party services.

Layout

In order to see the available API end-points, run the following curl command:

$ # replace <user> and <pword> with valid authentation details
$ curl -u <user>:<pword> -X GET https://api.tracdelight.com/v1/

Each end-point has corresponding documentation which can be seen below.

Authorization

@TODO

Faceted search

Faceted search is an API navigation technique which provides aggregated data based on provided search queries. Additional information about the requested resource can be returned conveniently. All of this happens in a single request.

Faceted search example

Let us consider performing faceted search queries on the Products API end-point. The following facet search parameters for Products are available:

  • category_id, brand_id, shop_id, gender, agegroup and color.

Using facet search parameters are just like normal query parameters:

https://api.tracdelight.com/v1/products?accesskey=<ak>&faceting=<facet-query>

Facet search parameters can be combined in one search when they are comma seperated:

https://api.tracdelight.com/v1/products?accesskey=<ak>&faceting=<facet-query1>,<facet-query2>

A faceted search can provide us additional information about products. Perhaps we would like to query the entire list of our products but also receive information about which categories exist and the number of items that exist in each category.

Requesting the following URL would achieve this:

https://api.tracdelight.com/v1/products?accesskey=<ak>&faceting=category_id

An example returned payload:

    {
        count: 2006755,
        next: 'https://api.tracdelight.com/v1/products?accesskey=xywhxtl11o9t2go2v6jyo5tlx3koie4b&faceting=category_id&page=2',
        previous: null,
        pages_total: 50169,
        results: [ ... ],
        facets: {
            "category_id": [
                {
                    "count": 1013640,
                    "slug": "bekleidung",
                    "id": "27weky56okebmq37",
                    "name": "Bekleidung"
                },
                {
                    "count": 340591,
                    "slug": "wohnen",
                    "id": "yw5cy70txfdsdwjh",
                    "name": "Wohnen"
                },
                {
                    "count": 219495,
                    "slug": "schuhe",
                    "id": "qjxg6yr20oy2a321",
                    "name": "Schuhe"
                }
            ]
        }
    }
